document_title: Lung fluke disease: Signs, causes, treatment, prevention
subsection_name: san-la-phoi.json_5_Risk factors that increase the likelihood of being infected with lung fluke eggs
subsection_content: People living in environments where lung flukes circulate; People like to eat salads, undercooked, and undercooked snails, shrimp, crabs, etc.
subsection_title: san la phoi.json. Risk factors that increase the likelihood of being infected with lung fluke eggs

People living in environments where lung flukes circulate; People like to eat salads, undercooked, and undercooked snails, shrimp, crabs, etc.
